attributes.action: Stop the passing of the new home owner energy bill
attributes.background: Stop this awful infringement of our human rights this bill will allow the government to fine us up to 15000 if we don't comply with net zero at our homes. They can also force smart meters on the homeowner.. Absolutely Disgusting

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643533
